title: How to Use Vanilla to Lessen the Smell of Paint

steps.headline: Purchase some vanilla essence or extract.
Open your paint can.
steps.description: For every half a litre of paint, add one teaspoon of vanilla essence or extract and mix with a paint mixer.

steps.headline: Begin painting.
steps.description: The addition of the vanilla essence or extract will not affect the paint colour but it should reduce, and maybe even eliminate, the odour of the paint. Enjoy smelling the vanilla!

text: Purchase some vanilla essence or extract.  Open your paint can. For every half a litre of paint, add one teaspoon of vanilla essence or extract and mix with a paint mixer. Begin painting. The addition of the vanilla essence or extract will not affect the paint colour but it should reduce, and maybe even eliminate, the odour of the paint. Enjoy smelling the vanilla!
